prompt.content: Calculate Stride's (ticker: LRN) EV/Operating Income multiple for fiscal year 2025 using their latest 10-K filing. Assume share price = $130 and F/D S/O = 50 million. Show answer as a number (multiple) rounded to 1 decimal.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Income from operations (located in Income Statement)= $360.094 million.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Long-term debt (located in Balance Sheet)= $416.322 million.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Current portion of finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $42.316 million."},{"criteria":"Long-term finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $44.567 million.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Cash and cash equivalents (located in Balance Sheet) = $782.497 million."},{"criteria":"Marketable Securities (located in Balance Sheet) = $202.769 million.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Equity value (Using stated in the promt assumptions) = Share Price × F/D/S/O = $130 × 50,000,000 = $6,500,000,000.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Enterprise value (EV) = Market Cap + Long-term debt + Current portion of finance lease liability + Long-term finance lease liability - Cash and cash equivalents - Marketable Securities = $6,017,939,000.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"EV/Operating Income multiple (rounded to 1 decimal) = 16.7x."}]
